metadata.title: CVE-2018-5308 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: PoDoFo 0.9.5 does not properly validate memcpy arguments in thePdfMemoryOutputStream::Write function (base/PdfOutputStream.cpp). Remoteattackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service orpossibly unspecified other impact via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
